item.title: Symbols
item.description: Pictograms, alphabets and numeric symbols are 3 important pillars of civilization.These three, have played a crucial role in the development and advancement of human civilization. Each pillar has had a profound impact on how we communicate, record information, and organize knowledge. Pictograms: The earliest form of written communication, pictograms served as a way to visually represent objects, ideas, and events. They laid the foundation for the development of writing systems by establishing the principle of using symbols to convey meaning.
